title: How To Change Your Gamma Settings in Minecraft

steps.title: Open your computer's Minecraft files.
steps.content: Open your computer's Minecraft files. Search for "minecraft" in your computer's file explorer.

steps.title: Review the list of files.
steps.content: Review the list of files. Click on the one that says "options" (It should be a .txt type). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Look at the multiple settings that you can change.
steps.content: Look at the multiple settings that you can change. Find the setting that says "gamma".

steps.title: Change the numbers next to gamma to be as high as you want.
steps.content: Change the numbers next to gamma to be as high as you want. When you're done, save and exit the file and the folder. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open up Minecraft and start a new world.
steps.content: Open up Minecraft and start a new world . If you followed these steps correctly, whenever you go into a cave or somewhere generally dark, you won't need to bring any torches because you can see everything. If you remain unhappy with your gamma settings, consider updating your computer's graphics card , or altering its gamma settings.
